Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: V. Polavarapu "Vik"
Reviews.Content: It is a good phone without needing any reboots or restart after getting stuck like many other phones. It is very good for my specific use.Pros:1. Small size, fits completely in a fist.2. Small screen, hence less battery consumption. But not that efficient as w580i.3. Qwerty keyboard is very helpful for my frequent note-taking.4. Superior and trusted Sony music quality and equipment.5. All regularly available apps present or can be added free of cost from market.6. Good speaker phone and volume. No problems.7. Long panning screen with widgets and menu.8. good camera but slow to start.Cons:1. The built in theme is not very good. It is all blue and not changeable.2. Camera doesn't start quickly.3. Music player is horrendous, can't make any playlists.4. Non-micro-usb data and charging cable. Sony is not eco friendly, adds more and more wires instead of using the std. usb cable like motorola.5. touch screen is sometimes sluggish.6. Need to remove backplate to remove the SD card.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: S. Burgess
Reviews.Content: This is the by far the best Sony Ericsson phone I have ever owned.I avoided touch screens for a while, especially with the touch keyboards but with this phone's touch screen + slide out key board there's absolutely nothing to complain about.The screen is vibrant, very reactive to touch. The phone itself is small, unique looking, and packs quite a punch with sound.Pros:Size - Fits in your hand and slips into your pocket!Speed - Connects to wi-fi at a touch or your provider's internet connection.Unlocked - No build up of monthly fees, this phone is free of contract.Capability - Amazing voice guided aGPS, full access to android market and applications.Multimedia - 5mp LED flash camera, buildable music library and great speakers that get very loud.GPS- The gps is like a Tom Tom, only better and already installed on your phone. Best part? It's free. I can't forget the voice guided directions :-)Cons:You need to download certain applications for different things, such as editing photos or sending files via bluetooth, etc. This is just a short problem though because the phone downloads really fast.Overall:I love this phone. If you are looking for a smartphone without the bulk, something that's unique, and a device that gives you all you need then I definitely would recommend the Xperia x10 mini pro!!!

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson xperia mini pro white
Reviews.Author: EV "jokerlom"
Reviews.Content: Works well, very fast Internet browsing. I am really enjoying the touchscreen and the keyboard function. Availability of wifi is very convenient as well.

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Ivan Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I am really happy with this phone.  Fast, compact and does everything i need it to do. It seems that some people is having problems when they want to use it as a console game.  But this is just a phone.had some difficulties connecting with my wireless net at work, but using the fixed ip option, solved everything.battery lasts verylong even if i have the phone connected to a wireless network most of the time i am at home or work.excellent!

Reviews.Title: Good for this price
Reviews.Author: Dhairya
Reviews.Content: I liked the phone... Using for last one month...cheapest in Android-phones and I bought for this reason only...One who has no problem with 2.6inch small screen, very good android phone for him....

Reviews.Title: What a headache
Reviews.Author: L. Seidell "lily-s2011"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because of some of the positive reviews. I wish people were more critical when writing their reviews. I must say I would not want a phone like this even if it is free. I returned the phone the 2nd day I received it.  Short battery life, hard to use, low ring tone volume, low phone voice volume. The wifi does not work, the internet is slllllloow.  A piece of junk. The SONY WONDER in NY city is so amazing, wish their product is more solidly designed and built.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Quick
Reviews.Content: Nice phone! it came on time and it worked fine, however, we had some issues with the battery. It's not the best cell phone that Sony has developed so far! :-(

Reviews.Title: compact phone
Reviews.Author: electronic
Reviews.Content: Gave this phone as a gift and he absolutely loved it, the phone is compact and easy to use. the one thing he wished it had was a longer battery life.

Reviews.Title: sony ericsson xp10mini pro
Reviews.Author: Ronwald
Reviews.Content: Arrived in pristine condition,totally sealed and packaged. Product device has everything in it to fully function in this day & age.Although, battery life is quite short when u use d navigation and background enable. It doesn't last 24hr when u use those that I mentioned above.But all in all,a good & versatile phone.

Reviews.Title: battery sucks
Reviews.Author: Telma Micheloto
Reviews.Content: The Sony Ericsson x10 mini pro is great if you are looking for a smartphone that's small and light and yet has a full qwerty keyboard. But the major problem is that the battery is ridiculously limited. It doens't even last a whole day. Be prepared to be stuck with a dead battery in the middle of a day out.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: M-C "M-C"
Reviews.Content: my favorite phone ever.  Batter life is decent, a couple days on average with lots of use.  Sounds is crisp and clear, good for both conversation and music.  Camera is better than some non-phone cameras.  Very convenient keyboard while maintaining small pocket size.  I can't wait for Sony to update it..

Reviews.Title: good for its time
Reviews.Author: Cherisse Lauren Berkeley
Reviews.Content: Many apps aren't available, the phone is durable, great battery life and doesn't take up much space.However don't expect it to work as efficiently as regular android systems as it's only able to perform half of the expected android features.Great Camera but no instagram.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: Jesus Malpica
Reviews.Content: excellent shop, 100% attentive and responsible, was just what I needed, and is the right size, I recommend it for future negotiations.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The keyboard was much too small to be effective for someone with adult sized fingers.  This was one of the main features I was looking for, and was a dissapointment.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Slim Thick
Reviews.Content: Loved this phone as soon as I saw it so I bought it on Amazon. Now I regret buying it. The touch screen is very very slow. When I try to answer a call the phone goes off. In the middle of a call, the phone goes off and takes really really long to restart. I almost pelt it out the car window a couple of times. I hate this phone. Okay..not hate. I like the alarm clock. It works well. Other than that, I really hate this phone!

Reviews.Title: Great little Android starter phone
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Got this phone to get myself to a basic Android phone without too much bells and whistles, and it seems to fit that objective. The Qwerty keyboard was what prompted me to choose this model as well. And the ability to operate the phone using one hand is a plus. Shipping from the seller was prompt, although the box did not have a manual or quick start guide, downloaded one from SONY website. Great for old-timers who like simplicity.

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson Xperia Mini Pro cell phone
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I bought this cell phone from HassleFreeCell.com and it only worked for 3 months. It then started to disconnect when I was in the middle of talking, bringing me back to the home screen. Also when I called someone, I could hear them but they couldn't hear me. I emailed the website (HassleFreeCell.com) I bought it from and they said they only covered the phone for 30 days and I would need to send it back to Hong Kong, which I had NO IDEA, that is where the phone came from. I can't get any information on how or where to send it back to for evaluation. HassleFreeCell.com will not help me in any way. They keep telling me to contact Sony, which I did, many times. They will not do anything because it's not from the US. I will never buy another phone from them again and I would advise, if you do, to make sure it is made for the American market!! They said it was a"NEW" phone but I'm beginning to think it was probably a refurbished phone. I can't imagine that a new phone would malfunction in such a short period of time. I'd advise everyone to shop a different Vendor unless you want to get screwed. They will not help you in any way, shape or form. Very poor Customer Service and no compassion for the money that was wasted!!($170.00)Once they are paid they are done with you...

Reviews.Title: beware: warranty only valid in Sony Asia
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: Contacted the seller (Wirelss everything) after the phone stopped working, it did not charge or powered on.Their response was that I had to deal with Sony Asia because it is an 'International Warranty' , that's the kind of customer service you can expect. This is the last time I buy from this seller and would not recommend them at all

Reviews.Title: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini Pro (U20i) Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone with Wi-Fi, QWERTY and 5 MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - I
Reviews.Author: Adriana Guerra Romero
Reviews.Content: El producto fué recibido como lo describe el vendedor.Lo recomiendo ampliamente.Producto nuevo y en perfectas condiciones.Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini Pro (U20i) Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone with Wi-Fi, QWERTY and 5 MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - International Warranty (Black)

Reviews.Title: Great for Price
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This is my 2nd Android phone (after the HTC G1) and to be honest I was a little skeptical because I really loved the G1. It was sturdy, size was good, I liked everything about it (except that it was pretty outdated, making the Internet and other interface fairly slow).I had to replace it because the backlight would not work, which made receiving calls problematic.Anyway, about THIS phone, needless to say it runs tons faster than the G1 though it probably does not compare to the high-end Android phones out right now (though that should be expected with the price)Pros:-Very small, every time I look at it in my hand I can't help but to love how tiny it is!-Physical keyboard very easy to use, the keys are well spaced and you know when you've pressed it-Touch screen responsive-Fast interface-Android makes interface intuitive, did not have to relearn everything-Sturdy, it feels tough and the sliding mechanism feels solidCons:-If you're feeling a bit tired and get careless with the touch-screen, it could seem a bit too sensitive. People with bigger hands should also avoid.-The green blinker that tells you you have a notification blinks every 6ish seconds, which is honestly not often enough for me, sometimes I want to get a quick look at the phone and know whether I have a notification or not..the G1 blinked very frequently, but this may be a pro for some.-No dedicated number keys - but this is to be expected on a small phone, it's a minor con for me-The messaging has a lot of random options that get in the way of the actual message, although it disappears when you're navigating it comes back while you're typing-The jacks/USB ports are exposed. This is not a major problem for me, but I can see it could be for many-It's like a dust magnet. But I think this is expected since it's a black phone, my G1 was white so I probably didn't notice the dust. It's something I can get used toFor me this phone does everything it needs to. As for the battery life, I was worried by the reviews but mine seems to hold up fine, I haven't had it go below 50% battery but then again I haven't gone on long excursions quite yet.

Reviews.Title: I'll send it back
Reviews.Author: Irene
Reviews.Content: Nice phone for the price, if it works properly. I took it to Europe, purchased a sim card with a data plan and hoped all will be good. But.. anywhere with not 100% or poor reception it keeps rebooting. Not just dropped calls, but shutting down while you are tweaking the settings, typing a message, browsing etc. It does this like 8 times in a row, so you can't get back to where you started. Annoying as hell.Also, started getting some buzzing while on the phone, sounds like some parts inside are lose or making noise.Volume - would like to make it louder, but there are not many options - even if you get to the "test" settings, it will still be not as loud as I would prefer.P.S. this is truly international version, with 3G working on european frequencies wherever 3G is available.

Reviews.Title: Good value android phone
Reviews.Author: Nate Ferrero
Reviews.Content: The phone works well, has a really cool if supposedly outdated "4 corner icons" interface around the main clock, the icons can be changed but default to useful things like phone, contacts, etc. Wifi works fast, I haven't been able to test 3G.

Reviews.Title: I could swallow this thing and pass it...
Reviews.Author: Carter Hooper
Reviews.Content: I had ordered this from another company, but it didn't have the Android Market on it. Could not get this baby outta my head tho: the feel, the size, the great keyboard. This place sells the unlocked one with the Market, so you got it all. There's nothing else like it out there. Wonderful.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: Rebe
Reviews.Content: this`s a really great phone, for a really nice price, believe me, you wont waste your money.it`s android and has a really good camera. beautiful!

Reviews.Title: Very Good
Reviews.Author: Piccolo1979
Reviews.Content: Needed a good celphone and I got it.I was very good to make bussiness with you. The equipment is awesome.

Reviews.Title: It is really cool
Reviews.Author: Tammy M
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is really cool however in my country "Ecuador" I can not use the internet in 3.5 G, maybe the software version or firmware are not accept for the network operator (Movistar Ecuador).

Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Katthia
Reviews.Content: This phone is horrible. I should had spend a little bit more for something that would had last longer. I bought this 6 months ago and hate it. It's a waste of time and money.

Camera - 5 megapixel with Photo flash, Auto focus, Geo tagging, Video light, Video recording. QWERTY keyboard: Easy typing with the full QWERTY keyboard. Touchscreen: Intuitive navigation
Networks: GSM/GPRS/EDGE 850/900/1800/1900, UMTS/HSPA 900/2100. Platform: Android OS 1.6, Processor: Qualcomm MSM7227 600MHz
Music: TrackID , Sony Ericsson Music player, Album art, Bluetooth stereo (A2DP), Supports music tones - MP3, AAC
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Ericsson XPERIA X10 Mini Pro (U20i) Unlocked GSM Android Smartphone with Wi-Fi, QWERTY and 5 MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - International Warranty (Black)
